message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $95 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $102.50?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I've reviewed my budget again and I believe I can agree to $100 for the product. I hope this works for you.
